name: Wick Creative
description: The Wick Creative theory is simple. The power of the big idea can catapult your company to the next level of sales and growth at the speed of light. That's why every endeavor at Wick begins with discovering and developing the thinking and strategy it takes to make a difference in today's market. Whether you're looking for just a logo or a fully integrated multimedia campaign, you'll find Wick has the concept driven approach that ensures your message will out shine the competition.
